EmailTemplate.subject: An Early Years apprenticeship with a difference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leaving school this summer?
We're pleased to announce that Step Forward have teamed up with LEYF Nurseries to find the next group of talented school leavers and...
We Want You!
Interested in hands on experience in the Early Years Education sector? Looking for an exciting opportunity with a well established family of nurseries?
We have vacancies available now so make sure that you apply today.
Tell me more.
Step Forward is a unique school leaver programme brought to you by The Challenge and we're proud to announce that we have partnered with LEYF Nurseries to bring you a career opportunity with a difference.
As a Step Forward Apprentice you'll benefit from the advice and support of a personal mentor, while receiving training in the classroom and on the job. Throughout the year you'll earn a salary, discover what it takes to succeed and build the networks needed to excel.
The London Early Years Foundation (LEYF) is a family of 36 community nurseries across London. They work with communities and parents to enrich and extend children’s learning, so that each child is the best they can be.
By supporting the next generation of people who will shape our world to become healthy, happy adults, you can change the world one child at a time.
Year One
Channel your passion for Early Years into a real-life nursery setting and earn £9,000.
Year Two
Possibility to secure full-time employment.
Yes please, what next?
You can start your journey today by filling out Step Forward’s 10 minute application form. Please login to our website using your email address and pin/password below.
